content: Whatever happened to L/cpl Smith after being exonerated of rape from the Philippine Court of Appeals? Has the Corps re-instated him or was he booted out? The accuser now lives in the States I believe?
reply: Whatever happened to L/cpl Smith after being exonerated of rape from the Philippine Court of Appeals? Has the Corps re-instated him or was he booted out? The accuser now lives in the States I believe?
title: L/Cpl D. Smith

content: He's safely back in the states, evidently - - Why would they boot him if he was cleared? That would be double jeopardy and an admission of guilt - - http://www.gmanews.tv/story/158402/Smith-leaves-RP-after-women-justices-absolve-him-of-rape Wandering and Wondering
